title: PSA how to beat inting sion
body:
First let me tell you that I think this strategy is really dumb and unhealthy for the game. It shoudnt exist in the first place. 

Okay to beat inting sion you have to kill him BEFORE (before being the key word) he gets to towers or else he is just going to demolish them. 

Good luck, I'd say have fun, but facing that shit isnt fun. so just good luck.
